text: Beccles railway station is a station in Suffolk, England for Beccles. Trains are currently run by Greater Anglia. ==Trains== Company Line Train Type Times Notes Greater Anglia ( -) - - - - - - - - Brampton - Beccles - - Class 170 Every 2 Hours Service to Harwich 1x per day == References == Category:Railway stations in Suffolk
title: Beccles railway station
